Row.Text: Zenobia
Paideia
Dislikes her neighbours and wants to conquer their lands. Likes Civilizations that collect Great People. Grievances against this leader decay at twice the usual rate.
(You are collecting Great People)
Zenobia is impressed by your collection of Great People.
(You are Zenobia's neighbour)
Zenobia covets your lands.

Dearest Empress Zenobia, your armies await your orders. You face large empires that seek to take the lands of which you lay claim to, lands that are rightfully yours. The wealth and legacy of Palmyra supports your conquests, Zenobia, so go forth and expand it's influence.
Imperial Aspirations

Districts grant +1 [ICON_GreatPerson] Great Person Point of their type in cities with an Established [ICON_GOVERNOR] Governor. +25% [ICON_Production] Production towards Heavy Cavalry. These bonuses are doubled in conquered cities. +2 Loyalty per turn in conquered cities.
Zenobia
Queen of the Palmyrene Empire
You demand my surrender as though you were not aware that Cleopatra preferred to die a queen rather than remain alive, however high her rank.

Septimia Zenobia was a third century queen of the Palmyrene Empire in Syria. Many legends surround her ancestry; she was probably not a commoner and she married the ruler of the city, Odaenathus. Her husband became king in 260, elevating Palmyra to supreme power in the Near East by defeating the Sassanians and stabilizing the Roman East. After Odaenathus' assassination, Zenobia became the regent of her son Vaballathus and held de facto power throughout his reign.

In 270, Zenobia launched an invasion which brought most of the Roman East under her sway and culminated with the annexation of Egypt. By mid-271 her realm extended from Ancyra, central Anatolia, to southern Egypt, although she remained nominally subordinate to Rome. However, in reaction to Roman emperor Aurelian's campaign in 272, Zenobia declared her son emperor and assumed the title of empress (declaring Palmyra's secession from Rome). The Romans were victorious after heavy fighting; the queen was besieged in her capital and captured by Aurelian, who exiled her to Rome where she spent the remainder of her life.

Zenobia was a cultured monarch and fostered an intellectual environment in her court, which was open to scholars and philosophers. She was tolerant toward her subjects and protected religious minorities. The queen maintained a stable administration which governed a multicultural multiethnic empire. Zenobia died after 274, and many tales have been recorded about her fate. Her rise and fall have inspired historians, artists and novelists, and she is a national hero in Syria.
Zenobia's Palmyra generates Great People through peace and conquest.
As Zenobia's Palmyra, you gain advantages in both times of war and times of peace.
You stand before Zenobia, Empress of Palmyra and the East, a title i am more then worthy to hold. And who are you?
I invite you to visit my fine city.
Yes, of course.
We should share maps.
Welcome.
Your delegation has shown respect and grace in my presence. They speak well for the rest of you.
I can't accept.
I have sent a delegation from my court, you should find them good company.
I accept these terms.
Our gates are closed to you.
It would beneficial for us both to open our borders and share the wealth of the land.
I look forward to working with you in the future.
No, i can not agree.
I would extend a hand in friendship.
Wonderful.
Disappointing, to say the least.
Our empires would grow stronger together.
A great ruler must surround themselves in a court of great people, then they can rule with the aid of wise people.
I am your Empress and your Queen, and your lands are mine to rule.
What a pathetic show of force. Quit wasting my time.
{LOC_DIPLO_ACCEPT_DECLARE_FRIEND_FROM_AI_LEADER_MER_ZENOBIA_ANY}
{LOC_DIPLO_REJECT_DECLARE_FRIEND_FROM_AI_LEADER_MER_ZENOBIA_ANY}
You think I care for your thoughts?
You would do well to listen to your advisors, they are surely wiser then yourself. (Denounces You)
I am a Queen and an Empress, and i shall live as one, bowing to nobody.
Your lands belong to Palmyra, it is the will of Gods.
Some things are better gained through political thought.
You would seek to end this so easily?
I would ask an end to this, for now.
I would rather die a queen, then live the rest of my life as anything lower.
[LOC_DIPLO_DEFEAT_FROM_AI_LEADER_MER_ZENOBIA_ANY]
芝诺比娅
派代亚
厌恶邻国并想要征服他们的土地。青睐收集伟人的文明。针对此领袖的怨念以双倍速度衰减。
（您正在收集伟人）
芝诺比娅对您收集的伟人印象深刻。
（您是芝诺比娅的邻国）
芝诺比娅觊觎您的土地。
最亲爱的芝诺比娅女皇，您的军队等待您的命令。您面对的是试图夺取您宣称拥有土地的大帝国，这些土地理应属于您。帕尔米拉的财富和遗产支持着您的征服，芝诺比娅，所以前进吧，扩展它的影响力。
帝国雄心
建立在沙漠且有 [ICON_GOVERNOR] 总督就职的城市，训练的重骑兵单位 +2 [ICON_STRENGTH] 战斗力[newline][newline]建成市场时，城市获得一个免费的重骑兵单位。免费获得的重骑兵单位无需维护资源。
芝诺比娅
帕尔米拉帝国女王
您要求我投降，仿佛不知道克里奥帕特拉宁愿作为女王死去，也不愿以任何高贵的身份活着。
塞普蒂米娅·芝诺比娅是叙利亚帕尔米拉帝国的三世纪女王。关于她的血统有许多传说；她可能不是平民，并嫁给了城市统治者奥登纳图斯。她的丈夫在260年成为国王，通过击败萨珊王朝并稳定罗马东方，将帕尔米拉提升为近东的最高权力。奥登纳图斯被暗杀后，芝诺比娅成为儿子瓦巴拉图斯的摄政王，并在其整个统治期间掌握实际权力。
270年，芝诺比娅发动了一次入侵，将罗马东方大部分地区纳入其统治之下，并以吞并埃及告终。到271年中，她的王国从安纳托利亚中部的安卡拉延伸到埃及南部，尽管她在名义上仍隶属于罗马。然而，为了应对罗马皇帝奥勒良在272年的征讨，芝诺比娅宣布她的儿子为皇帝并自封女皇（宣布帕尔米拉脱离罗马独立）。经过激烈战斗，罗马人获胜；女王在她的首都遭到围困并被奥勒良俘虏，后者将她流放到罗马，她在那里度过了余生。
芝诺比娅是一位有教养的君主，在她的宫廷中培养了一个知识分子环境，向学者和哲学家开放。她宽容对待臣民并保护宗教少数群体。女王维持了一个稳定的行政机构，管理着一个多元文化、多种族的帝国。芝诺比娅在274年后去世，关于她的命运记录了许多故事。她的兴衰激励了历史学家、艺术家和小说家，她是叙利亚的民族英雄。
芝诺比娅的帕尔米拉通过和平与征服产生伟人。
作为芝诺比娅的帕尔米拉，您在战争与和平时期都获得优势。
您站在芝诺比娅面前，帕尔米拉和东方的女皇，这个称号我当之无愧。那么您是谁？
我邀请您参观我的美丽城市。
是的，当然。
我们应该分享地图。
欢迎。
您的代表团在我面前表现出尊重和风度。他们为您说了好话。
我不能接受。
我从宫廷派遣了一个代表团，您应该会觉得他们是好伙伴。
我接受这些条款。
我们的城门对您关闭。
开放我们的边境并分享土地财富对我们双方都有利。
我期待未来与您合作。
不，我不能同意。
我想伸出友谊之手。
太好了。
至少可以说，令人失望。
我们的帝国在一起会更强大。
伟大的统治者必须让自己置身于伟人的宫廷中，然后才能在智者的帮助下统治。
我是您的女皇和女王，您的土地由我统治。
多么可悲的武力展示。别再浪费我的时间了。
{LOC_DIPLO_ACCEPT_DECLARE_FRIEND_FROM_AI_LEADER_MER_ZENOBIA_ANY}
{LOC_DIPLO_REJECT_DECLARE_FRIEND_FROM_AI_LEADER_MER_ZENOBIA_ANY}
您以为我在乎您的想法吗？
您最好听听顾问的意见，他们肯定比您自己更聪明。（谴责您）
我是女王和女皇，我将作为这样的人生活，不向任何人低头。
您的土地属于帕尔米拉，这是众神的旨意。
有些东西通过政治思考能更好地获得。
您想这么轻易地结束这件事？
我请求暂时结束此事。
我宁愿作为女王死去，也不愿以任何更低等的身份度过余生。
[LOC_DIPLO_DEFEAT_FROM_AI_LEADER_MER_ZENOBIA_ANY]
